prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted solid translucent head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dims introspection. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal patterns, styled with Cherub dims influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by blue and neutral grey inspired by nature structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with Archon-resistant armored robes and divine spark tunics with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating Reinforced leather for protection, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with serpent Ouroboros ring with dims spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor OBUAORS's profile: 'She who is half darkness', Aethyr VTI, Earth element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'As OBUAORS approaches, the light dims into a thoughtful twilight mysteries stir in the quiet, inviting deep introspection into unseen complexities.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted solid translucent head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dims introspection
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal patterns, styled with Cherub dims influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with Archon-resistant armored robes and divine spark tunics
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating Reinforced leather for protection
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with serpent Ouroboros ring
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who is half darkness'
profile_data.essence: As OBUAORS approaches, the light dims into a thoughtful twilight mysteries stir in the quiet, inviting deep introspection into unseen complexities.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Twilight Mystery; leads mountain wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted obsidian crystal form that shifts between solid and translucent states, representing the liminal nature of twilight and the threshold between darkness and light
profile_data.color_reasoning: Charcoal represents Earth element's groundedness, midnight blue symbolizes Scorpio's mystical depth and the Aethyr VTI's mysterious nature
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure represents sacred geometry of Earth, fractal patterns symbolize infinite complexity of mystical knowledge
